english.segment1: Death is no conflict, for those who do belong, The very last life breath, starts a brand new song-. Promised to find, what I've been looking for, I guess then we will meet right at Heaven's door
english.segment3: As I wander the streets of gold. Talk to all the friends I've known. We'll go adore the Master King, Then only then I'll be breathing in.
english.segment4: For me to live is Christ, and to die is gain, When I leave this earth, I'm not coming back again. So I wear this life like a dirty coat, Give up my tattered threads when I cross the moat.
english.segment5: Life has no conflict, for those who do belong, This very moment can start whole new songs. When I pass through; die, as we all shall do, I'm going to fall at the feet of the one who created me. and you
english.segment6: Only peace, no disease, no more rain, no more pain, No more tears, no more fears. Breathing in.
